page.title: 13SCHOOL IN HALBERTON (1)
page.content: On 20th June we went to{Halberton {First School}and we asked Mrs Vinton, the Head,some questions about the School. We also asked the children some questions about the school and what they do and what they like best.We asked the children what lessons they like best and they all said they like{ {maths}the best.Altogether there are 25 children in the school.There are 2 classes and 2 full-time teachers and 1 teacher who comes in on Tuesday mornings. In{PE lessons}the children go swimming most of the time in their own swimming pool.It is a medium sized pool,and is covered with a plastic sheeting,and is coloured blue.In the Winter they do country dancing in PE lessons. Mrs Vinton told us that after they leave the school they go to{William
